revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TD-W8961ND |revision=v1.x |series=TD-W8961ND |asin=B004ERXXHC |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_date=09/14/2010 |fcc_id=TE7TDW8961ND |pcb_id=2011500082 |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TrendChip |cpu1_model=TC3162LEM |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT3052F |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q16BVSIG |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q16BVSIG |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |ram2=8 |ram2_brand=ESMT |ram2_model=M12L64164A-7T |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J2,, J3 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Ralink |sw_model=RT3052F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=xDSL (ADSL2+) AFE;TrendChip;TC3086;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=90:F6:52 |oui_eth=90:F6:52 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=&model=TD-W8961ND Product page] *"2011500071 Rev: 1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"2011500082 Rev: 1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the user photos. [[TrendChip]] ADSL SoC + [[Ralink]] WiSoc (w/ integrated FE Switch) *"MODEL: TD-W8961ND(IT) VER:1.0" (Rev: 1.1) is silkscreened on the label. :Chipset TC3162LEM / TC3086 + RT3052F (2MB SPI Flash, 16MB SDRAM) The default SSID pattern is likely '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'''. ===Serial pinouts=== *J2 - RT3052F (WLAN) *J3 - TC3162LEM (ADSL) :Speed: 115200 (8-N-1) 
 1 Â© 3V3
 2 o GND
 3 o RX
 4 o TX
